gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 96, Nets 95
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Nets, 96-95, in overtime. Jimmy Butler led the way for the Heat with 31 points, five rebounds and four assists, while Tyler Herro added 29 points (4-11 3PT FG) and 11 rebounds in the victory. Mikal Bridges (26 points, nine rebounds, six assists) and Cam Thomas (23 points) combined for 49 points for the Nets in the losing effort. The Heat win their third straight game as they improve to 24-16 on the season, while the Nets fall to 16-23.
